objects.text:
• Digital LED Display
• Multiple Wash Cycles
• Large Loading Capacity
• Energy-Efficient Operation

product_details.name: Insignia High-Efficiency Front Load Washer - Modern Laundry Solution
product_details.description:
• Digital LED display with easy-to-read time remaining and cycle status
• Multiple wash cycles including Express, Delay, and specialized settings
• Large capacity front-loading design for efficient cleaning
• Advanced temperature control with multiple water temperature options
• Energy-efficient operation with modern wash technology
• Sleek white exterior with black glass door design
• User-friendly control panel with intuitive dial selector
• Custom wash options including soil level and spin speed controls
• Delay start function for convenient scheduling
• Durable construction with stable base and leveling feet
• Modern digital interface with clear cycle indicators
• Compact yet spacious design perfect for any laundry space

banner_details:
This promotional banner centers around a high-efficiency front-load washer featured prominently on the right side. The background showcases a clean, modern grid layout with circular and linear geometric accents, evoking precision and technology. The text layers—namely "heading", "subheading", and "tagline"—are positioned on the left and use bold, modern sans-serif fonts to establish a tech-forward yet accessible tone. The "description" text outlines product features in bullet points, while "price" is displayed boldly near the bottom right. A blue button, consisting of "cta_background" and "cta" text, invites immediate action. Overall, the banner balances clarity and aesthetics with strong commercial appeal.

**Color Palette**:
- Deep Blue: #1e5795
- Light Gray: #f5f5f5
- Medium Gray: #e8e8e8
- Dark Gray: #333333
- White: #ffffff
product_color: The product image showcases a modern front-load washing machine with a sleek, minimalist design dominated by a clean white base (#FFFFFF) that conveys hygiene and simplicity. The black circular door frame (#1A1A1A) adds contrast and depth, drawing attention to the center. The control panel features a glossy black background (#0A0A0A) with bright electric blue digital indicators (#00BFFF), creating a tech-savvy, high-end feel. Hints of metallic silver (#C0C0C0) on the knob and subtle gray shadows (#B0B0B0) enhance the product’s contours and reflect its modern engineering. These colors are well-blended yet distinct, making for a high-contrast, futuristic, and clean color palette ideal for advertisements.
